message: I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor, which is fair considering future rounds will reduce the value for you due to inflation.
Considering the inflation, I think a 55-45 split is more reasonable, as the value will decrease for me in the next rounds.
Due to the 20% inflation penalty you face each round, this 65-35 split is actually better for you than waiting another round. If you reject, your next share would be worth even less.
